amendment.description: To require a report on the feasibility of developing and deploying a nuclear debris collection and analysis capability to permit the characterization of detonated nuclear devices.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1308 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1308 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Biden. (consideration: CR S9566-9569; text: CR S9566-9567) To require a report on the feasibility of developing and deploying a nuclear debris collection and analysis capability to permit the characterization of detonated nuclear devices.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1308 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Biden.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1308 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
